headline: LyondellBasell to address 2026 Bank of America Global Agriculture and Materials Conference
summary: HOUSTON and LONDON, Feb. 20, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LyondellBasell (NYSE: LYB), a leader in the global chemical industry, today announced that Agustin Izquierdo, executive vice president and chief financial officer, will participate in a fireside chat at the 2026 Bank of America Global Agriculture and Materials Conference in Fort Lauderdale, Fla., on Thursday, February 26, 2026, at 9:45 a.m. EST. headline: LyondellBasell Slashes Dividend in Half. The Stock Is Falling.
summary: Commodity chemical maker  LyondellBasell  said it would “recalibrate” its dividend, declaring a quarterly payout of 69 cents a share—essentially half of the prior $1.37 payout.  “Despite one of the longest downturns in our industry, LyondellBasell was able to return approximately $2 billion to our shareholders from existing cash and operations in 2025,” said CEO Peter Vanacker in a news release.  LyondellBasell stock was down 3.1% in premarket trading at $53.62, while  and  futures were down 0.3% and 0.2%, respectively.

LyondellBasell stock was down 3.1% in premarket trading at $53.62, while  and  futures were down 0.3% and 0.2%, respectively.

headline: LyondellBasell Slashes Dividend as Industry Challenges Persist
summary: LyondellBasell’s board has roughly halved the chemical company’s rich dividend amid a prolonged industry downturn.

raw.headline: LyondellBasell Slashes Dividend as Industry Challenges Persist

headline: LyondellBasell slashes dividend as chemicals downturn pressures cash flows
summary: Investing.com -- LyondellBasell Industries announced on Friday that it has cut its quarterly dividend by almost half, reducing the payout to $0.69 per share from $1.37, marking a 49.6 percent decrease.

raw.headline: LyondellBasell slashes dividend as chemicals downturn pressures cash flows
raw.summary: Investing.com -- LyondellBasell Industries announced on Friday that it has cut its quarterly dividend by almost half, reducing the payout to $0.69 per share from $1.37, marking a 49.6 percent decrease.

headline: LyondellBasell recalibrates quarterly dividend
summary: HOUSTON and LONDON, Feb. 20, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LyondellBasell (NYSE: LYB) today announced its board of directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $0.69 per share, representing a $0.68 per share reduction from the company’s fourth quarter 2025 dividend. The dividend will be paid to shareholders on March 9, 2026, with an ex-dividend and record date of March 2, 2026. “Despite one of the longest downturns in our industry, LYB was able to return approximately $2 billion to our shareholders

headline: LyondellBasell Slashes Dividend Amid 'One Of The Longest Downturns In Chemical Industry'
summary: LyondellBasell Industries (NYSE:LYB) shares are down during Friday's premarket session following the company's announcement of a significant dividend reduction.
